result.arabic_text: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِي ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَبۡدٗا
result.translation: 93. Yallih ginok Hebelttô ginoy qaranwaa kee baaxol tani matan külli num keenik Racmaan kinni Rabbi fanah naqasuy Ramma iyyaah xixxibaanc-lih yanih yamaate kaa akke waytek Qhiyaamah ayro.
